channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on Shriman Keshri
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Shriman Keshri

item.title: Open problems in AI and ML
item.description: A blog contains 29 Open problems in AI and ML. Explainability Learning to learn #Evolvebility Learning to learn or *meta-learning *(e.g., Harlow, 1949; Schmidhuber, 1987; Thrun and Pratt, 1998; Andrychowicz et al., 2016; Chen et al., 2016; de Freitas, 2016; Duan et al., 2016; Lake et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2016) is the acquisition of skills and inductive biases that facilitate future learning. The scenarios considered in particular are ones where a more general and slower learning process produces a faster, more specialized one.
